sent.orig: At that time, to also go away, and also to retire shall retire, about it hard!
sent.trans: 到那时，想走也走不掉了，想退也退不得，想想也难受！

sent.orig: Many people retire to the country, where they can enjoy peace and fresh air.
sent.trans: 许多人迁居到乡村，在那儿他们能呼吸新鲜空气，过上宁静的生活。

sent.orig: Those perks allow some employees to retire early and receive pension premiums.
sent.trans: 这些优惠让一些雇员提前退休并享有退休金。

sent.orig: He intended to retire from active life, but fate had decided otherwise.
sent.trans: 他打算从活跃的生活中隐退，但命运却做了不同的决定。
